title: Ep. 3 - Is that a...hair...there?!?
itunes:title: Ep. 3 - Is that a...hair...there?!?
description: Getting older comes with a lot of perks, but it also comes with just a few humbling changes. The errant chin hair that unfurled overnight falls into this category. Let's discuss.
